name: Flick Basketball Championship
description:
Flick Basketball Championship is an addictive game designed for basketball fans, as well as many fun game modes where you can show off your basketball skills!

Express your style by choosing from tens of different balls.

===== How to play =====
- Touch a ball and fling towards the basket to shoot it;
- You need to score as many points as possible within the given time, since each stage has target points to proceed to the next stage.

===== Features =====
- Bright and vibrant graphics & effects;
- It is a game that is accessible for people of all ages.
- Five courts, choose your favorite themed environment;
- Great shooting experience;
- Various difficulty levels, to make the game more exciting and interesting;
- Well-designed basketballs, to make the game more enjoyable and addictive;

Visit http://bgamesworld.com to see the whole gamelist and feedback to Studio.
